Reviews.Title: “I would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: Michelle C
Reviews.Content: PRO: Ok to start off with it was very clean. This place is a border line "Hotel" not motel. We felt very comfortable there. The mattress and box spring were both covered with a removable and washable cover to prevent infestations and I could tell that it was brand new. The carpet and bathroom flooring was clean and not sticky or damp ( I hate that). For a motel the room had a fridge that was not tiny and the bathroom was acceptable size. The staff was very helpful and would not accept tips (We tipped anyways :)) CON: There are no beach front views from the rooms although it is on the boardwalk, so be careful when you see beach front listed (They do however have a veranda in front of the building). Also even from the Third floor you can hear the loud music from the store downstairs which starts early in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Another great visit”
Reviews.Author: Luclog
Reviews.Content: This is our second time staying at Safari and there was no question about it when we decided to go on this visit. This place is ideal for us since we take our dog with us and they are super helpful as our last time. The room was clean which is important to us and beds are comfortable. Thank you Art for your wonderful hospitality and making our stay enjoyable. The friend we had with us will also be taking advantage of your facility hopefully in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Location and cleanliness are the only things.....”
Reviews.Author: debsalsa
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a pet-friendly hotel in Ocean CIty, MD, the choices are few and far between. Safari Motel is right on the boardwalk and the parking is free so these are big deals. The room was tiny but clean. I am amazed by the pet fees being charged in Maryland and Virginia. This one was $30 per night and in my current location, they are actually charging $40 per night for a declawed, spayed female cat. Ridiculous!!! At Safari, the usual amenities that we have all become accustomed to during our travels, are absent. No breakfast, no hairdryer, nowhere to hang clothes, needless to say, no iron but again this is the beach so I guess it's okay to walk around wrinkled. I found it to be overpriced but I guess when you are on the boardwalk, it's whatever people are willing to pay.

Reviews.Title: “What we needed”
Reviews.Author: Sarahe5682
Reviews.Content: The main reason my husband and I booked this hotel was because it was the only pet friendly hotel with availability for labor day weekend. The room had everything but a microwave. It was just an old hotel. There aren't any plush amenities. There isn't a pool either. We did like the fact that there was a community balcony, tile floors, and that it was on the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “No Smoke Dectors Really?”
Reviews.Author: KaylaK322
Reviews.Content: Okay, so My sister and I went on vacation this past week (Monday-Thursday) we had previously stayed at Safari for one night on a quick trip 2 years ago. It did its purpose, and I really remember this being a clean place to stay for being a motel (not big on motels) when we go to the hotel it was a bit after 3 on Monday, we checked in. When I reserved the room online from their website, I requested the main building and a non animal room. I got the complete opposite. Okay thats fine Ill deal. Get to the 2nd builidng room and it spelt freshly clean (AWESOME!) but I did not want that building (being two younger girls not very safe) look around everything was ncie, but still not happy... Look up at the wall and the smoke detector was pulled out of the wall. That was the last straw. Went to the front desk, advised them of my request and the fact that there is no smoke detector and ask him for a room in the main building and he could not provide as they were full, I then ask for atleast a smoke detector and he was going to give it to me, he then was somehow able to find a room in the main building(since he could not provide a detector). we get in that room, and it smelt of pee/mustiness. Overall, it was accomodating and the owners were friends but still not the happiest i have been!

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: Kateryna90
Reviews.Content: The room we stayed at was very small, but perfect for two people! It was clean, and the staff was friendly. We couldn't ask for more for the price we paid. Location is awesome, it's right on the boardwalk and the beach is a minute away. I would definitely come back to this motel again!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good value”
Reviews.Author: KA6184
Reviews.Content: My family and I enjoyed our stay at the Safari Motel, The location is perfect for an Ocean City vacation and they provide convenient free parking. The room was very clean and although the furniture was a bit beat up, the beds were comfortable and there was plenty of hot water. We enjoyed the decks overlooking the ocean and the bike rentals right in front of the hotel. They have free wifi and coffee. With their location we were able to park the car and not move it until we were ready to leave. It was a good value and exactly what we were looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience!”
Reviews.Author: Nat U
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this motel to my family and friends, I had an excellent experience. Perfect location, very clean, pets friendly, it is all what i need. Staff were very hospitable and welcoming. I will come back to Safari again!

Reviews.Title: “not the best”
Reviews.Author: ami n
Reviews.Content: if you like nice rooms that are bigger then a closet dont stay here. the room was so small.just room for a bed.the guy at the desk was not very friendly.not horrible but not the best place either... wouldnt even think about staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Safari Motel OCMD”
Reviews.Author: hacarr88
Reviews.Content: I would not stay here again. The rooms are very small with tiled floor. Lamp without light bulb and sand on the floors before you even walk in. Way over priced for what it's really worth. Only plus side is that you can bring a pet. Also there was loud music and paper thin walls.

Reviews.Title: “location trumps ammenties here”
Reviews.Author: meobbo1
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Safari for twice in the last 2 years. We do not need to have much more than a clean room, comfortable bed and clean bathroom. The free coffee is nice. The best part is that you can get a room on the boardwalk for about half of what a majority of the hotels on the boardwalk want. It is in a nice location because the crushing crowds on the boardwalk are about 10 blocks away. The beach is literally 50 yards from the front desk. The balcony is a great place to hang with a cup of coffee or glass of wine and watch the people go by. The staff is very friendly. We think this place is a great value, if you don't mind the coffee as the only ammenity. Will not hesitate to return.

Reviews.Title: “Desperate times call for desperate measures”
Reviews.Author: KCPrevatte
Reviews.Content: We decided at the last minute to take our family to Ocean City for Memorial Day weekend. I looked online and only two hotels were showing availability, one of which was the Safari Motel. The Safari was on the boardwalk whereas the other one was a mile away. Easy decision. The room was $230 plus tax which seemed reasonable for an oceanfront hotel at the last minute. I had read some reviews on TripAdvisor that suggested the hotel was old but not terrible, and that the service was excellent. We took a shot and booked the room online, got a confirmation number, packed our stuff into the car, and went. PARKING When you initially arrive, you pull into a little half-circle adjacent to the lobby. It's large enough for two cars or so. This is not a busy area of the street and is right in front of the boardwalk. Once you've checked in, you move your car behind the main building or to the side of the second building in a dedicated lot for the motel. You get a little piece of paper indicating that you are a guest. The nice thing is that the motel lets you keep the parking spot for the entire day after check-out. CHECK-IN We arrived at 10:15 PM. My kids were asleep in the car, so I left hubby in the car with them and went to check in. The guy manning the desk was friendly enough, but when I gave my name, he tells me, "I tried to call you. We don't have a room for you. There was a glitch in the system, I don't know how, I tried to get Expedia to call you but they said they wouldn't. I feel bad." He goes on for 10 minutes about how this isn't the motel's fault, that Expedia has bad practices, etc. I show him the confirmation information, I tell him that we drove 3 hours to get there, and it's now 10:15 at night with no rooms anywhere else. He says that he DOES have a room for me, after all, but it needs housekeeping first. By this point, I'm too tired to argue and just ask when we can get into the room. He says "10:30 maybe." I go park the van and we decide to wake the kids and walk the boardwalk a little bit. It's a nice night, not chilly, and we figured it would be an adventure. THE ROOM We finally get into the room and I am in shock. Maybe I've been spoiled by all the other hotels (anywhere. ever.), but this room reeks of febreeze, the tile floor is gritty with sand, and everything is mismatched and worn down. It's *not* charmingly mismatched or lovingly kept. This is a random mash-up of furnishings, bedding, and decor. On the plus side, the bathroom (while old) is SPOTLESS. There is no grime, no nothing, in the bathroom. This is a redeeming factor. Also, the window-unit air conditioner seems to work well enough although unfortunately it's not loud enough to drown out the unhappy couple fighting viciously in the courtyard below our room. Mind you, it's 10:45 so we pray that there are no bedbugs and go to sleep, hoping things will seem better in the morning. (They don't). LOCATION The motel is directly on the boardwalk and it's nowhere near the pier, crazy crowds, amusement park, etc. Which, in my opinion, is a plus. The beach area in front of the hotel was not packed even though it was Memorial Day. This part of the strip was quieter and relaxed. We thought the location was fabulous. We did walk as a family all the way down to the pier and back, and it wasn't a strenuous walk. We enjoyed it. There is a tram that will take you up and back for a nominal fee, if you don't want to walk. SERVICES Apparently the lobby serves coffee but no one in my family drinks it, so we didn't partake. Otherwise, I don't think there are any services available. There is no restaurant on property, not that it matters, since OC has tons of food options all around. CONCLUSION In fairness to the motel, they don't claim to be new or fancy. Their claim to fame is purely their location and the (relative) cheap cost. Maybe I'm a snob, but I had low expectations coming in and they couldn't even meet those. I don't care if there's a "glitch" in the reservation system. I made a reservation properly, I got a proper confirmation, and I expected a room. While I'm of course happy that they "found" me a room, I was really unhappy with how somehow I was made to feel anxious and defensive upon arrival and that I should be grateful that I was getting a room at all. Would we stay here again? No, we wouldn't.

Reviews.Title: “Great location,very clean and friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: EllenChicago
Reviews.Content: The hotel is right on the boardwalk, which was very convenient for the week that we stayed there. My room and the hotel were very clean and the staff was helpful and nice. It made us feel at home. My family and I had a great time and will be returning in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service, Accommodating & Friendly!!!”
Reviews.Author: cwartella
Reviews.Content: My family and I travel quite a bit and it is not very often that we find a business as accommodating as Safari Motel on the Boardwalk in Ocean City, MD. We had originally planned to stay in O.C. one evening and were at another motel in the area. Keep in mind, we have two pets that we travel with and finding lodging is not always that easy. When we decided to stay, we were forced to find another motel on short notice. I called around and found less that friendly service on the other end of the phone. However, the staff as Safari went out of their way to accommodate my family and pets. After staying one night, we decided to stay another. (Yes, I know, not great planning, but we often do things spur of the moment.) Yet again, they we able to arrange reservations and rooms to allow us to stay one more night during one of the busiest times of the travel season. My family and I will most definitely stay at the Safari again and I will suggest to anyone who wants a convenient, clean and friendly place to stay while in O.C. to give them a call.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Very Nice Staff”
Reviews.Author: David I
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my Wife, Daughter and Family Friend. Man at the front desk was very helpful in letting us know where to go for good eats. Daughter loved all the things to look at in the lobby and the pink bathroom. The room cleanliness was excellent. Just far enough from the amusement park to remain quiet, but still have a nice walk there and back. Overall had a great time and would stay here again! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Worst place I ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Rachiefaye355
Reviews.Content: The staff is incredibly iggnorant. You pay $1000 for your room n toilet doesn't work and then the manager lies about it and sneaks in your room. You have to listen to dogs barking at all hours because people r idiots n take their animals on vacation with them and lock them in their hotel room. I will never stay here again and never recommend this place to anyone. If I could get my money back I'd transfer hotels now.

Reviews.Title: “Great Accomodation! Great location and excellent service!”
Reviews.Author: Luclog
Reviews.Content: Trying to find a place to stay for me, my daughter, 2 grand kids and a dog at OC was a challenge because of our dog, but we were pointed to the Safari by another hotel who did not accept pets and I am glad we were. The folks here were very helpful and made us feel very comfortable even the dog. Yes, the room was small but how many people stay in their rooms at the beach... especailly when it's right on the boardwalk, so very convenient. The beds were comfortable, even soft sheets:), we slept well. Art was very accommodating and with kids we had lots of questions and any obsticles were quickly removed. Thank you Art for making our visit very comfortable and pleasant, my daughter and I would for sure come back to stay at your place.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxation in OCMD”
Reviews.Author: beach027
Reviews.Content: I just got back from another relaxing and wonderful vacation in Ocean City, Md. The Safari Hotel and Management, helps make our vacation the most wonderful experience. The place looks great it has everything you need to relax, free coffee, tea, ice, refrigerators in the room, excellent maid service and the most pleasant staff, in housekeeping and they also accept your pets which is very accomadating on vacation. The hotel is very clean and has added some new remodeling touches which enhances its beauty. It is conveniently located on the boardwalk which is right outside so you can walk the beach and boardwalk, go to the shops, ride a bike which the safari rents bikes now to you for your enjoyment. I can not say enough nice things about the staff and hotel, I would never get this great treatment from other hotels, Our dogs, Starr and Eddie also appreciate the beach. We have been going to this hotel about five times a year now or more for the last 17yrs and have never been disappointed, You have to check it out and see for your self what a great location and place this hotel has for everyone. It is the best in Ocean City, MD. My husband and I and our dogs would like to Thank Everyone at this hotel and look forward to another trip in September down OC MD at the Safari. Thanks Again, Cecelia, Al , Starr and Eddie Shemanski

Reviews.Title: “Small room but very clean, GREAT location!”
Reviews.Author: Brandi S
Reviews.Content: The service was INCREDIBLE. Stayed at this hotel for 1-week in August 2011, we were pleasantly surprised. The hotel staff was incredibly accomodating and helpful. Parking is available right outside the building. It's located right on the Boardwalk, in a prime location. Far enough away from the end of the pier with the amusements to not be too noisy, but in a great spot The beach is about 200 ft away from the motel. It's super convenient. The bed was clean, the room was very clean. I think this hotel is really underrated! We WILL stay again, we loved it!

Reviews.Title: “Beach Peaceful Paradise”
Reviews.Author: beach027
Reviews.Content: I am writing to tell you how wonderfurl and peaceful my recent trip to the SAFARI MOTEL has been, We checked in on NEW YEARS EVE and stayed four wonderful nites. I would also like to compliment the staff and owners of the motel on our last vacation for Thanksgiving Week for five nights. I could not write a review on that wonderful vacation because it was too early since my September /October Vacation on trip advisor.I would not vacation to Ocean City Maryland since September, If I Was not having such a peaceful and wonderful time. I would not be staying at this motel everytime if it was not such a Pet Friendly, People Friendly and Clean and Accomadating Staff and Management. The Motel is located right on the boardwalk and is very clean and conviently located on the boardwalk where you an watch the sunrise and the peaceful feeling of the ocean. The restaurants and stores are all located right on the boardwalk, or you can get a bus and see the rest of the Scenic View of Ocean City and Assategaue island tours, or take a boat ride out on the ocean. We appreciate beyond words the Hospitality by the Management and staff and the Pet Friendly Motel. The motel is clean and has refrigeration in the rooms and the staff is always remodeling and adding extras to make your room feel like home. We have stayed at this motel for aprox 17 years and about five times each year .There is no other motel we would ever think of staying at.when this one is the best. AL and I , and our Dogs, , STARR AND EDDIE would like to extend our Thanks for another Wonderful Experience and Vacation. another added extra that the staff has added is you can rent a bike right from the motel. It keeps you wanting to come back . New Years Day watchin the sunrise was my most Peaceful and Cherished Moment of this year and without the thoughtfulness of the motel management We would not have been able to experience this relaxing vacation. I advise anyone who wants to experience a wonderful relaxing in Ocean City , MD should check this motel out. You wont be disappointed, It has great locantion, cleanliness, Pet Friendly, Refrigerantion , Bike Rentals and more and the best friendliest staff and management in OC MD. Thanks again, Safari Motel, Mgmt and Staff, Cecelia, Al AND Starr and Eddie from PA, Looking forward to our next Vacation soon at the Safari Motel, Oc Md.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for allowing dogs”
Reviews.Author: Sabyreed
Reviews.Content: Room Overall the room size was a plus. Very nice that you get a refrigerator and microwave. Only problem was that we could hear people walking up and down the stairs and moving chairs in their room. Would not be good if your dog is a barker. Or Uf you're a light sleeper. Location Excellent. Could not ask for more in terms of enjoying the beach, boardwalk, and neighboring streets. Check In/Out Safari staff is great. No problems with reservations. Process was quick and easy. TV While you won't have a flat screen, you get a decent size, not too old box tv. You get all the cable channels you would need if you stay in one night. It definitely beats the Knights Inn so worth the money, especially if you have a dog. And they don't restrict based on the size of your pooch. In fact they'd never even see your dog. Just lie and say he/she weighs 45 lbs and you'll be fine. I will admit the hotel may look creepy from the outside, but it was clean and not disappointing. If it had thicker walls, I would give it a 5

Reviews.Title: “another great stay at the Safari!”
Reviews.Author: professorrock
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here for the past 14 years. The motel is perfectly located for us--on the boards and away from the honky tonk noise. The facility is old(built in 1962), but is mostly well maintained and above all...CLEAN!!! They accept pets and there is absolutely no evidence of pet odor! We stayed on the fourth floor right next to the balcony and it was like almost having a private deck. The free coffee is a great asset. This year they have added bike/surrey rentals. There is a security system which monitors the corridors and parking lot--making you feel safe--it is not intrusive at all. We take TV trays to use in the room and on the deck. Looking for an older motel that accepts pets? Try the Safari for value and above all cleanliness.!

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: dtrostis
Reviews.Content: I've just came from a stay on the Safari motel and I have mixed feelings about it. The location is superb, but the rooms are not very good it was full of ants. On the other side the staff is nice and helpful. The good thing is that allows pets in the hotel and I couldn't feel any noise from other rooms.Ahh, no breakfast, but Wifi and TV included.Free Parking and coffee. The main concern is that the price is like a 4 star hotel in Fifth Avenue,maybe because the Labor day weekend, but for that price i will expect much more.

Reviews.Title: “One of the Best on a Budget!!!”
Reviews.Author: MickJamie
Reviews.Content: The Safari was wonderful and located directly on the boardwalk. Yes, the rooms are a little small and there is no pool but if you are on a budget and want to walk out on the beach this is the place to stay. I base a good review on how clean a hotel is.....this place was immaculate. The maid service was great, the staff were all friendly and it had a feeling of home. I took a last minute trip with my teenage daughter and one of my main concerns was feeling safe. The staff watched out for us just like family. It is also pet friendly (some were there during our stay) but we never heard any barking or noise. I can see why many of the people staying there go back year after year.

Reviews.Title: “Okay for what it is”
Reviews.Author: nickx5
Reviews.Content: If you plan on spending alot of time in your room and enjoying hotel amenities do not stay here. There are no amenities and rooms are very small. However, room is very clean and its in a perfect location. Its nice how the rooms are tiled and not carpeted because carpet is dirty alot of times in hotels. The beds are stiff, so if you like sleeping in soft beds you wont be comfortable. My dad woke up with back pain because of the bed, my mom couldent wait to be home sleeping in her own bed. Also, the water pressure in the shower is low. Overall, we enjoyed it for what it is: a clean room in a great location. I wouldent reccomend this to anyone looking for luxury. If what your looking for is a clean place to rest your head, stay here. If you want more, stay at the hilton and pay $300 more a night. Your choice :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: James B
Reviews.Content: We rented two rooms for a week, one with our dog. The rooms are very clean and the price is reasonable. In addition, there are two porches that face the boardwalk that are great for afternoon and evening relaxation. The location, on 13th Street, is perfect for a walk on the boardwalk and is centrally located to drive north or south. We will definitely stay at the Safari in the futue.

Reviews.Title: “Great Pet Friendly Motel”
Reviews.Author: Misty G
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful stay. We stayed in the second building, the room was very spacious and clean, staff was very friendly and accomodating. I was very pleasantly suprised for it being a pet friendly motel you could not smell the odor of dogs at all in the room, i have stayed at more expensive hotels and you could smell that the rooms were pet friendly. Location was wonderful. Also if you needed extra pillows, hair dryer or iron they have them at the front desk, and the room i stayed in had a fridge and microwave. I will definitely be satying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Carebear2961
Reviews.Content: We reserved two rooms. One for our daughter, her hubby, & 3 kids under 5, and another for myself & hubby. Rooms were very small (at least on 1st floor), saw upper level rooms which appeared larger. Our other daughter, her boyfriend, & 2 kids stayed in our room 1 night and was only an extra $20 for the night!! The staff was very accommodating, polite, & willing to help w/ anything. No microwave, but invited us to use the one in the employee's lounge. Will stay here again, but will request an upper floor for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Yuck!”
Reviews.Author: davemd1820
Reviews.Content: The place smells musty & of some kind of disinfectant odor. This motel badly needs renovation. Others have commented positively on the service & housekeeping. I agree that the staff seems friendly & the housekeeper did a good job, considering what she had to work with. The carpet is worn-looking. The walls are flaking apart around the windows. The windows don't slide well due to broken tracks. The ceiling & walls have multiple water stains. Furnishings look 40 years old. The door to the room uses an actual key, not a key card. The bathroom door did not lock. The sink did not drain (well, it did after 20 minutes). The toilet took forever to refill & then ran all the time. No outlet or hair dryer in the bathroom. The exhaust vent does not work. The shower water goes hot or cold depending on usage from other guests. We went out to the common oceanfront balcony. It was nice, but basically it gets used as a smoking room. Amenities: ice. No pool. As you walk the boardwalk in the evenings, you will wish you had a pool. As someone else said, they keep the fire escape door open all day. This allows a breeze to pass through the corridor. The 13th St & Boardwalk location is convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Maribeth_9
Reviews.Content: The manager was very helpful and kind. He carried our bags for us and always greeted us with a smile.We have been seaching for a nice pet friendly hotel and certainly found it at the Safari. WE spent a lot of time on the boardwalk overlooking covered 3rd floor porch with our pets, reading and people watching. The room was clean and pleasant, down to the animals made of folded towels and left on our beds each day. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone wanting to enjoy a trip to the seashore with or without pets.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to be back to Safari”
Reviews.Author: lleno62
Reviews.Content: It was my first time in Ocean City. I stayed in Safari Motel. Enjoyed very much the place and had a great time. People at Safari are nice, pleasant to talk to, and very helpful. Room was clean and well-priced. Safari is pretty close from the ocean and to everything you need to have a great vacation. Will be back at Safari soon.

Reviews.Title: “A Wonderful Experience!”
Reviews.Author: Nik4213
Reviews.Content: We came from Pittsburgh and drove through the night to get to Ocean City. I have been coming here every year and have stayed in many places..by far Safari has been the most impressive in terms of customer service. We arrived at 5:45 AM and were greated by one of the smiling owners. He allowed us to park so that we could enjoy the beach. After breakfast, we were walking back to the car to grab our towels to sleep on the beach. He ran out of the hotel and let us know that the room was ready for us to go and rest up!! This was totally unexpected. When we walked into the room it was clean (and I check), the bathroom was very tidy, and everything looked great! The staff was most helpful the entire stay and everyone who stayed there was so nice. The view from the balconies is great! Safari is not a newer motel..it does have some old Ocean City charm, but do not let that scare you away from a wonderful experience. You will NOT find service like this at many of the other places. I will def. be coming back to the Safari! Thanks for a wonderful vacation!

Reviews.Title: “The one I love most in Ocean City!”
Reviews.Author: ivushkal
Reviews.Content: I've traveled a lot and stayed in many places. Safari in Ocean City is one of the best. It is best located - steps to the beach and close to everything one needs to have wonderful vacations by one of the most pleasant beaches of the US. It is clean and run by lovely and friendly people. Service is excellent. I plan to stay again in Safary, this time with friends. Hope the weather will be nice. Safary Motel is definitely worth the money you pay to stay and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Great Ocean front Building”
Reviews.Author: Henri2001
Reviews.Content: Safari Motel has two big balconies ocean front. My kids loved it. They were going to the ocean and I was watching them from the balcony. The room was very clean and the price for the location was very good. I do a lot of checking around before I book a room. I would recomend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Blec! the strong and pungent smell of Incense and musty filled the lobby!”
Reviews.Author: jumpinjax
Reviews.Content: Full Dusclsoure: My husband and I didn't actually STAY overnight at this hotel. We drove to OC, MD late on friday. Arrived without any reservations anywhere. Tried several different hotels and came upon this one. At approximately 1am, we go to the lobby with the full-on 1970's safari theme and incense burning. At least the smell of incense. Now I'm not super Old school but there are generally only 2 reasons why people burn incense. (1) Everyone always thinks incense covers up the smell of illegle things burning. It doesn't, nor am i accusing this establishment of such and (2) the a bad smell created by humans. Whatever was going on it should have caused us pause before we secured a room. Unfortunately, we are exhausted and just wanted to lie down. We did ask to just peep at the room before we unload. The front desk guy gladly showed us to the room. We took an awfully rickity elevator up to the 3rd floor. Upon exit we notice the door to the fire escape was WIDE OPEN! Yep, wide open. I suppose this helps to air out the musty smell of this hotel. Front desk guys has the nerve to show us to the fire escape because this is where we have a good view of the parking lot in which we should have parked. Convenient! Any any other bum on the street can also come right on up to our floor and take a nap in the hallway! Awesome! Then he takes us to the other end of the hallway to see the shared balcony. Overlooking the boardwalk and leaning so terribly, I was afraid to stay out there any longer. Next, the room. you open it up with a key. Nope not the electronic type key, but an actual metal old school tumbler type key. Now I'm feeling really safe. We go to the room and see 2 double beds. I was afraid to sit on them. Then the ultimate kicker...the bathroom! Circa 1963, it was a deep sky blue! All of it! And there was also a lovely hair in the sink! Yes this place was nasty. Needless to say, we did not stay. It's no wonder this place accepts dogs! I think our little pooch would have been offended. Don't stay here unless you have giant nasty dogs. Leave them in the room and stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was just okay.”
Reviews.Author: ndntelliott
Reviews.Content: We stayed here during the 4th of July Week. It was not the best nor was it the worst. Hotel room was small. Did not have carpet on the floors. Bathroom did not appear to be very clean.. Hotel allowed big dogs to be in rooms with owners. Rooms are to small for big dogs. Dogs barked constantly. The only good thing about hotel was that it was right on the boardwalk. Staff was very friendly. Hotel was over priced for what you got.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to crash after a busy day”
Reviews.Author: infrequentflyer2011
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay if you're looking for a comfortable room by the boardwalk without taking a huge hit to your wallet. The entrance is literally right next to the steps leading up to the boardwalk and the beach, and large common balconies overlook the water. On thirteenth street, the Safari Motel is ideally located in the middle of the boardwalk, with the quieter hotel-heavy end to the left and the main boardwalk attractions to the right. The hotel room itself was clean and functional with cable television, a small fridge, two lamps and two beds. We used the motel wifi to watch Netflix on the laptop without a problem. The AC is a window box, but it was powerful and adjustable so it served our needs just fine. We had none of the issues I see other reviews complaining about, but if you're looking for amenities like a pool or microwaves in each room, this isn't the place for you. Pets ARE welcome at this hotel but everything was very clean, and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly - they worked hard to make sure we were comfortable and happy with our stay. I would definitely recommend the Safari to anyone who wants to enjoy the beach without spending a lot of money on fancy full-featured rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Less than expected”
Reviews.Author: blue_archer4
Reviews.Content: Hotel Seemed Clean And The Staff Were Nice. The Boardwalk View Was Very Nice As Well. Other Than That, We Had A Room That Had A Leaky Tub (not just a drip, drip drip) No Table, No Microwave (we were promised a room WITH one) And For It Being A Double Full Bed Room There Was Very Little Space. The Outlets Were Very Old, Impossible To Keep The Plugs In Safely. Poor Lighting (only one ceiling light that took about 10-15min to "warm" up, and one bedside lamp.) They Do Have Free WiFi, But It's Very Slow And Drops.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!Very Clean & Friendly Motel”
Reviews.Author: jenhagler
Reviews.Content: i chose this motel because of the reviews...This motel fools you completely when looking on the outside....Clean rooms, Good smell thru out the motel..Irvin & crew very helpful & friendly..

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Motel”
Reviews.Author: mimills64
Reviews.Content: Safari Motel was very clean. I own a cleaning business for 21 years and look at that when I stay at a motel or hotel. The staff was very friendly and would do anything for you. I would recommend this motel. Thank you Art and your staff for a great stay, will come again and stay longer. Michelle L. Mills Cleaning

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: tmcphersonjr
Reviews.Content: Great location in the middle of the boardwalk. Very clean. Courteous staff. Great price. Kids loved it. Great ocean view from balconies.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxed OceanGetaway”
Reviews.Author: beach027
Reviews.Content: I would like to tell you about the excellent time Al and our dogs, Starr and Eddie, had at the beach. I can not say enough about the Courteous, Clean, Comfortable and Best Location to stay on the boardwalk. The owners and staff are very people and pet friendly. Without this hotel we could not bring our dogs to the beach and be able to enjoy ourselves with such a stress free Vacation. We have been a longtime beach fans for aprox 17yrs of this hotel and beach. This winter in Pa was extremely difficult for us due to weather and family loss. However, the past week at the beach, helped us to unwind and relax and the staff at the Safari helped to make our trip the enjoyable vacation that it was. We can not wait to go back. The hotel is located right on the boardwalk it is clean and restaurants, shops and bikes or just walkin is within easy reach and of course watchin the Beautiful sunrise is as easy as lookin out the window or sittin on the bench right out the door of the hotel. OF course the beach is just a skip away. I would recommend this hotel for anyone who wants a BEAUTIFUL BEACH VACATION GETAWAY. I can not say enough for this hotel and staff but I suggest that YOU Check it out for yourself , and of course, if you have pets , it is an added plus because it IS THE BEST PET FRIENDLY HOTEL ON THE BOARDS, MY PETS GUARANTEE. Lookin forward to next trip there in couple months.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable no frills room”
Reviews.Author: achaholic
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Safari Motel over the Easter weekend. We chose the Safari motel after reading on the message boards that they were pet friendly and our usual spot (Barefoot Mailman) was under new management. When we reserved there was a disclaimer that pets must be under 25 lbs but when we called they said it was not an issue to bring our definitely larger than 25 lb Golden Retriever. The location for Safari Motel is ideal. It is right in the middle of the boardwalk. You can walk north for about 15 blocks where it is a bit calmer or 15 block south toward the hustle and bustling inlet. There are 2 buildings for Safari Motel - the main building and another one across the alley. We stayed in the blue building across the alley. Amenities wise, Safari is basic. There is no pool, no continental breakfast, no Internet access, window unit AC, and small 19" CRT TVs. The room we were in did have a microwave and mini fridge. We stayed in a double room, which was surprisingly clean considering the age of the place. As with much at the Safari, the furnishings seemed old and could use an update. The beds were of average comfort and water pressure was sufficient. Our room (#34) had a few minor issues - the remote for the TV didn't work great (had to mash the buttons down) and the bathroom door did not fully close (see picture). Parking was fine for the Easter weekend. There are approximately 6 spots in front of the blue building as well as a larger lot next to the building. I can see that during the peak season it may get a little tight though. The front desk staff was friendly. Maid service came but but they didn't do a very good job. They tossed the soap that we were using and only left 1 bar (for hand washing and showering), did not leave an extra TP and tossed out the left over dog food left in my dog's bowl. Overall, I would recommend the Safari for budget conscious travels looking for a no frills room. It certainly is a decent option for those traveling with pets if you don't mind forgoing some of the more modern amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Not at all pleased with room!”
Reviews.Author: ArmyBaybe
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is great. Right on the Boardwalk. They allowed us to park our Harley Davidson right by the front door on the side walk. The management was nice. The room though was VERY small and right by the front door so you could hear everything everyone was saying. The door to our room looked like a dog had chewed the bottom of it and you could see through to the outside floor! They didn't clean the rooms very well either. When we got there, there was hair all over the tub and bathroom sink. There was also sand on the floor as you walked in. I personally wouldn't stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean! Convenient! and they accept pets!”
Reviews.Author: professorrock
Reviews.Content: we have stayed here for the last 10 or so years. The motel offers a no frills room which is ultra clean and well maintained. The mini fridge is definitely a plus,but we take a cooler for our beverages(there's free ice in the lobby). We take our dog with us and this is one of the few motels which accepts pets in OC. Did I mention how CLEAN the place is? Fresh linen and towels everyday! The location is perfect--quiet and steps to the boards and beach. Free Coffee/tea in the lobby 24/7! Arthur, Irving and the rest of the staff will go out of their way to make your stay a good one. We love the Safari and will continue to go there.

Reviews.Title: “ULTRA-CLEAN, ULTRA-ACCOMODATING”
Reviews.Author: tannersmom64
Reviews.Content: First-Time Stay, with much apprehension as this is one of the few ocean-front hotels that accept your pet. The Staff at the Safari are KIND, and no doubt, pet-lovers. They go above and beyond to make sure guests are comfortable, (as well as their furry children). The Location is Stellar (just steps to the boardwalk). I am one of those obsessive people who can NOT SLEEP in a dirty room, You will see people CLEANING AND SPRUCING UP here, Very Attentive to Cleanliness. You can't beat this older Hotel for Price and Value, the rooms that accept pets are tile floored, which is brilliant. Bravo to the Safari, you can teach an old-dog new tricks!

Reviews.Title: “If you don't want to leave your dog behind, this is the place for you - and it's clean!”
Reviews.Author: ktbaby85
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my stay at the Safari Motel. What initially attracted me to the hotel was that it was pet friendly and the only people I trusted with my pet were traveling with us. Our room was located in a 3 story building directly behind the hotel. Just about everyone there had a dog which made me feel right at home, but I was a little worried that the rooms would not be clean. I was very surprised to find the rooms not only were clean, but had no trace whatsoever of previous furry visitors. No smell, no pet hair, nothing! The rooms admittedly need a little updating, but if you're looking for a clean place to stay with your pet, this is it!! The front desk staff were incredibly friendly and willing to help with whatever you need. The Safari Motel is literally right on the Boardwalk - right next to the Phillips restaurant/hotel on the beach, where we had an exceptional (but expensive) meal. Just a couple of things to be aware of before your visit: only one car per room gets a parking permit with the hotel, so you're going to have to find parking for additional cars. We just parked on a side street during the wee hours of the morning. Also, you may want to bring your own pillows since they ones they provide are pretty flat. I will definitely be returning to this place and reccommending it to my pet-loving friends!

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful and fun place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Birdrimata
Reviews.Content: This motel has a great location on the boardwalk right in the middle. The staff was very friendly and ready to provide you anything you may of needed during your stay with them. You share the balcony with all who stay at the motel and what fun we had on it meeting new friends. The price of the room is very reasonable and we will be staying here again on our next return to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Like our Home away from Home on the beach !!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anth311
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth year at the Safari - 13th and Boardwalk is the best place as it is close to the action withouit out the noise of blocks 1-8 ....two decks to relax on and have a beer and watch the ocean and the action on the boardwalk ..The staff is awesome and accomidating..Coffee and tea and ice always available at the front desk. I checked several properties and this was the best price by $ 20.00 a day. Its close to everything !! Its four floors so its easy to get in and out . My friend has 2 small daughters and it takes forever to go back and fourth in larger hotels. Walk out the door and the beach is 50 feet away. I know this sounds silly but the showers are good also...clean and they have special shower heads that have good pressure and massage feature..Brand new air conditioners, very comfortable. We love it there and will be returning soon. Its a comfortable,safe, clean, friendly place to stay and would recomend it to anyone. It has free internet also which is a must when I travel,

Reviews.Title: “Very upset”
Reviews.Author: 5Poole
Reviews.Content: I booked a room on line for myself ,my husband and our 3yr old, 3 weeks before the trip.And got a comformation email from hotel. We got to the hotel so early we did not expect to be able to get into our room, we were hoping we could get our parking pass so we could go to the beach for while. When I went to office they informed me they did not have room for me and are sending me to another hotel on 20th street bay side ( Islander).They gave us a $20 discount on the other room and told us we could park in the Safari lot any time. They then checked my older Daughter in to her room ( she booked by phone 1 week before) She said her room was Small. The Islander was was nice enough (could have been a little cleaner and rooms need major update in our building.) We wanted to be on the boards( Safri is in a great Location on the board.) not have to get in car or cross Coastal Hwy with a little one to get to the beach and boards. The Final Straw was at 7pm the night we tried to check in at Safari I got an email saying our room had been Canceled.

Reviews.Title: “Pet friendly with a clean and friendly place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: October056
Reviews.Content: It was very difficult to find a motel that accommodates dogs, especially two. My husband and I found the room extremely clean and a staff that was very friendly and helpful. My pups, family, and I enjoyed our 2 night stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good value!”
Reviews.Author: moniq1231
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay. We were upgraded on arrival, we arrived at 11am and not only did they let us use parking right away but let us have a room even though check in wasn't until 3pm. The staff was super friendly. It was no Hilton, but I didn't pay for a Hilton. I paid for a room with a clean bed and bathroom to sleep in. Thats exactly what we got. If you just need a place to sleep and shower, then this place is for you. If you are looking for the extras like a huge room, a pool, etc, then look somewhere else. Ps. even though we were in a pet friendly hotel, we didn't hear any dogs at night. All in all, loved it and we will certainly return when we go back to Ocean City, MD. The only con was there was no internet in the room at all. Not even wifi options. Nothing.

Reviews.Title: “Won't Be Staying Here Again! In Desperate Need Of Updating!”
Reviews.Author: Trinity05
Reviews.Content: When we walked through the door we were totally surprised. The motel seemed pricey for the room. Yes, it was on the Boardwalk but still. The room was small, the bathroom was really small, the curtains were really dusty, there was a dead spider on one of our "clean" towels, and the room really needed some updating. We came in and were told to go outside and "wash the sand off of our feet". Our old fashioned key wouldn't open our room door so we went for help, We were told that our key had sand on it and that is why it wouldn't work. Maybe, but i think he could have been a little nicer about it. We stayed here because of our dog, but never again! We would leave her home first next time! They don't even have a pool! :( Some of the staff were really friendly, Some were not... When we checked out they did tell us that we could park there as long as we wanted, and use their bathroom...

Reviews.Title: “Great place if you need to travel with pets!”
Reviews.Author: kitten7989
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a nice stay at the safari on the boardwalk. We had to change our plans very very last minute due to our dog getting sick. I have reservations about hotels that accept pets, but was highly impressed with how CLEAN the room was. No need for the Lysol, sani wipes, and sheets I brought lol. The staff was the very friendly and super accommodating. I was shown my choice of rooms in person and picked the room that best fit our needs. The room I chose was out dated, but super clean. The rooms in the main building were very nice but close to the office and I knew our dog would bark. The location is wonderful, the rooms clean and the staff very friendly and helpful. Check in was very quick, check out consisted of handing them a key. If you are looking for frills, this is not the hotel for you. If you are a pet owner, this is a clean accommodation for you and fido. The staff is tight on security, however this makes stay more enjoyable, as there are several teen partying guests vacationing in OC. Room was quiet and very very clean!

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing Experience”
Reviews.Author: beach027
Reviews.Content: I just got back from another wonderful, relaxing, vacation at the best hotel on the boardwalk and in Ocean City. I can not wait to go back in September. The owners and staff are the most friendlist and courteous people , they are so kind to my husband, Al and our two dogs , Eddie and Spirit. The staff are very accomodating and gracious, there is fresh coffee all day long. You have easy acess to the bus and boardwalk just a skip away , along with perfect view and walk to ocean. You have plenty of shops and restaurants you can walk to on boardwalk. My older dog, Spirit, is over 16 years old and has many medical problems , however the staff and owners, are so kind and caring to her. I can not say enough kind words about the hotel with there wonderful cleanliness and accomodating staff. All i can say is if you are taking a trip to Ocean City. Stay at this hotel and see for yourself the wonderful experience you will have. Thanks again, SAFARI HOTEL FOR THE MOST WONDERFURL VACATION, WILL SEE YOU SOON! From , CECELIA,AL & SPIRIT AND EDDIE , the dogs Your friends from Pa

Reviews.Title: “Good for the Price if you need to take a pet.”
Reviews.Author: packednreadyNePa
Reviews.Content: What I liked: price, location, pet friendly, very clean, friendly staff, large public porch overlooking the boardwalk. What I did not like: Irresponsible Dog owners that left their dogs alone to bark for hours on end, rooms did not have security locks and the door to the lobby was opened most of the day and the desk was often unattended. This is a typical older hotel at the shore. It has not been updated but was very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for great price”
Reviews.Author: dbish33
Reviews.Content: You cant beat the price for the fantastic location of this motel! While it certainly isnt a 5 star hotel, and it might be a bit outdated, it serves the purpose of a room to sleep in while your vacationing at the beach. The beach is steps away from the hotel and there is a fantastic coffee and bakery shop right next door. The cleaning crew was very polite and would offer you extra towels or anything you needed. The only negative is that there is no pool........my son prefers a pool over the ocean, but no biggie.

Reviews.Title: “place only if you need to take your pet”
Reviews.Author: travel2009Pittsburg
Reviews.Content: Me and my family came home with FLEA BITES and FLEAS in our bags!!! We was to get a bigger size room but that never happened !! The dog in the room next to us barked all night long !!! The air con, was broke only cooled the room off early in the morning.. Room service was not really bad but when it came to cleaning the bathroom I dont think she wipped anything down.. Trash still left in the can's !!! If you have to take your pet with you than maybe stay here. But if you take no pets, STAY somewhere else !!!! They dont even have phones in the room for you to use or to even call the front desk !!!

Reviews.Title: “On the beach pet friendly on the boardwalk a great time!”
Reviews.Author: ship2stone
Reviews.Content: Reserved a room for family and poodle. Proprietor was taciturn but friendly, offering us umbrellas and boogie boards for the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice people”
Reviews.Author: suz
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Safari July 30 - Aug 2nd, 2009. We had the suite, which is one long narrow room with a pull out couch, 2 double beds, and a king bed - the room had 2 AC units, a full fridge, and a microwave. It's not the fanciest hotel - but it was clean, comfortable, the employees were friendly, and the location and price cannot be beat - I would definitely stay there again. You also receive a discount if you shop at the Safari jewelry shop, which we discovered while browsing there. My only criticism would be against guests, not the hotel - The Safari is pet friendly - Several guests had the YAPPIEST dogs I have ever seen (footnote, I am an animal lover) - Please, if your pet is not well behaved, leave it home!

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad at All”
Reviews.Author: jwbike85
Reviews.Content: Found the Safari Motel via ococean.com and made reservations on the www. Motel has a great location, right on the boardwalk. The room we reserved was a little to small so we were able to upgrade to a larger room. The room was clean and maid service was good. The TV reception was lacking and the A/C unit had a slight smell when it was first turned on but went away in a short while. The room had a microwave and small fridge, both worked well. Not a five star resort but well worth a look at for those on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Once again best vacation experience at this hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: Fairytinkerbells
Reviews.Content: This is our second year in a row at this great hotel. You can not beat this deal. Totally clean & friendly hotel with a ocean front view with beach access right in front of the hotel. Anything we needed they got for us right away. Rooms was A++++ and the bathrooms were super clean. On check out day I couldn't find any carts to take our stuff downstairs because they were being used by other guests and they were kind enough to help us carry our things downstairs. I would highly recommended this hotel for all ages. We traveled with our two young children and they had a great time. See you guys again next year =)

Reviews.Title: “Don't let the word "motel" fool you”
Reviews.Author: kung_fu_chick
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this place because it was the cheapest and had the best location right on the boardwalk. The staffs were very nice and friendly. Upon arrival, the room was not ready because we got there early, but they gave us a parking permit and told us we could use the bathroom (which was really clean), have coffee and access to the ice machine. Since the motel was not full, we were upgraded to a 2 double bed room for the price of one double bed room with a partial view of the ocean. The room itself was old but very clean. In fact, it was better kept than a lot of 3 or 4 star hotels I've seen. Overall, we really enjoyed our experience at Safari Motel and would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT stay here!!!”
Reviews.Author: hipphome
Reviews.Content: I called in advance to book a room. We chose this hotel because we wanted to bring our dog to the beach. Upon our arrival, they did not have a room for us so they acted like they were giving us a "free upgrade". It was no upgrade. I guarantee that this room was closed for maintenance reasons and they put us in it because they had overbooked. The ceiling leaked into my son's suitcase which was on a table next to their TV. All of his clothes were wet and we had to dry them on the heaters. When the people above us used their showers, we realized this was when we could look forward to the drips and leaks. The floors were wet throughout the entire room which was DISGUSTING!!! We always wore our shoes in the room. The electrical outlets on one entire wall of the room would not work (the same wall where the main leaking was located). I am thoroughly convinced that this room was a fire hazard and should not have been rented at all. We ended up being there for 2 nights but I would have left earler if I had booked for a full week. I would NEVER stay here again nor would I recommend to ANYONE to stay here themselves. We had the managers to our room quite a few times due to these problems. They did not even offer to discount our rate!!!!! AWFUL, TERRIBLE, HORRIBLE place not even fit for a dog!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: lala_k
Reviews.Content: Excellent price for a hotel right on the Boardwalk and beach. The staff is friendly and proffessional. The hotel is not a five star hotel, but it is a well kept, clean facility. It is also a pet friendly hotel. I have no complaints about this hotel, every thing was as stated. We spend most of our time on the beach and out to dinner. This is a clean place to sleep, shower, and ejoy coffee in the am.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: JoeinMD
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a stay at the Safari, and I can honestly say I had no negative experiences whatsoever ! The rooms are as clean, or cleaner, than most more expensive places I have stayed in Ocean City. The bathroom was spotless and well maintained. The staff was very friendly, without being overbearing, and made a point to advise of the free coffee available all day in the lobby, as well as the wonderful "shared decks" overlooking the Boardwalk. The deck was a fantastic place to relax at night, socialize with other guests, and enjoy a few drinks while watching the activity below on the "boards" !. After we checked out, we were advised that we could leave our car in the parking space until we were ready to leave, if we wanted to spend a bit more time shopping or just walking the Boardwalk. Additionally, the location is wonderful - right on the Boardwalk, but far enough from the downtown portion to be less noisy and rowdy. We had a very enjoyable experience.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: janetjeanne
Reviews.Content: My family recently stayed at the Safari and we were very pleased with the motel. We had one room for ourselves and one for our 2 teenage boys. The rooms were clean and the bathrooms were very clean. The rooms were not large, but plenty big enough for our needs and very affordable. The location was perfect - close to every place we wanted to go. We also really enjoyed sitting on the large community balcony that overlooked the boardwalk and beach. The staff was very nice and helpful. We plan on staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Safari”
Reviews.Author: EllenChicago
Reviews.Content: This was our ideal vacation in Ocean City. We stayed at the Safari in August for 5 nights. My family and friend accompanied us to this mini vacation. The staff went out of their way to find us another room for our friends to stay in. The beach was right there, the restaurants within walking distance, and the view from the shared balconies was magnificent. The kids loved it, they just walked right out to the boardwalk and beach. This was our first time to Ocean City. Safari Motel was the right choice for us and we recommend it to anybody that wants convenience and great service. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Our rooms were serviced every day of our stay. One thing I have to say is that the bathrooms were really, really clean. Overall our first time in Ocean City at the Safari was Great!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: electra3
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Safari for our family vacation in August. It was a very nice place, clean and comfortable. My kids enjoyed being right there on the boardwalk near all the attractions. The beds are comfortable and most important the bathrooms are really clean. It was a perfect quiet vacation for our family. Definately will book again for next year!

HotelInfo.Name: Safari Motel Boardwalk
HotelInfo.Address: 13th Street and Boardwalk, Ocean City, MD 21842
